Key Match Events: The Royals lost two of their best players on the same play in the bottom of the eighth inning.
The Astros tied the game at 3 on the play which ended both Erceg and Pasquantino's nights.
Reliever John Schreiber relieved Erceg and allowed three runs to score, leading to a 6-3 Royals loss.
Post-Match Reflections: Royals manager Matt Quatraro said Erceg and Pasquantino were receiving X-rays after each of them injured their right hand.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pasquantino is fourth in MLB in RBIs with 97 this season.
Erceg had a 0.68 earned run average entering the night.
Others: The game was part of the series opener against the Houston Astros.
